member.name: P:Amazon.DateTime.DateTimeBase.Value
member.summary:
Creates a timestamp of the format of 'yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.fffzzz'
Sample: 2020-01-28T16:09:05.366-05:00

member.summary: DateTimeCalculator

member.name: M:Amazon.DateTime.DateTimeCalculator.NthOf(System.DateTime,System.Int32,System.DayOfWeek)
member.summary: Get the nth day of a specific month

member.name: M:Amazon.DateTime.DateTimeCalculator.DaylightStartDate(System.DateTime)
member.summary:
Daylight Savings starts on the Second Sunday in March at 2am
https://greenwichmeantime.com/time-zone/rules/usa/

member.name: M:Amazon.DateTime.DateTimeCalculator.DaylightEndDate(System.DateTime)
member.summary:
Daylight Savings ends on the First Sunday in November at 2am
https://greenwichmeantime.com/time-zone/rules/usa/

member.name: M:Amazon.DateTime.DateTimeCalculator.IsInDaylightSavingsTime(System.DateTime)
member.summary:
Figures out if the current date time falls inside Daylight savings time
https://greenwichmeantime.com/time-zone/rules/usa/

summary.para: IF result is less than 0; THEN t1 is earlier than t2
IF result is 0; THEN t1 is the same as t2
IF result is greater than 0; THEN t1 is later than t2

IF result is greater than 0; THEN t1 is later than t2
